m_szDocSumamry: dateText -------------------- Sunday, October 26, 2014  Sunday, October 19, 2014  Sunday, October 05, 2014  textArticle -------------------- Broader Perspective  Ideas from  Philosopher  , Economic Theorist,  Blockchain Scholar  ,  DIYbio Innovator  , and Startup Founder  Melanie Swan  regarding the hope and potentiality of our future  Sunday, October 26, 2014  Connected World Wearables Free Cognitive Surplus  The immediate reaction to the Connected World (26 billion devices by 2020 as predicted by Gartner; more than four connected devices per human; or really 1 for some and 20 for others) is
